html:
5.9.17  10:05 am   how long do you usually take to learn a new thing? do you get frustrated when it takes a long time to get it right?

     it depends on the thing. for example, learning the capital of mexico (it's mexico city) would be a fairly quick process. learning to reverse-engineer the human genome might take a bit more time, with possibly some mishaps along the way

5.9.17  9:17 am   hey i just started learning how to play guitar. do you think paganini's caprice no. 24 is a good song to start with?

     it's best to start with songs you already know very well

5.9.17  8:22 am   Does my teachers suck? Guess.

     maybe

5.9.17  8:14 am   you are okay with profanity,

     i don't have a good system for determining whether a word is 'profanity'

     so why don't you like the word nigga?

     i don't not like it. i think it's great. wouldn't use it, for reasons i can explain later if you're still interested

      (feel free to replace any characters by asterisks or whatever you feel comfortable with) I like using the word, especially when referring to the best of my friends, I'd never use it as an insult.

     i understand

5.9.17  8:06 am   why do you still pretend like we don't know what HOTEWIG is about?

     i'm sure you know, but many people don't know. people still ask me every day what it is and what it's about. some people think i'm not even making a video. "make a video" they tell me

5.9.17  8:05 am   After HOTEWIG, do you think you'll ever do more history videos? Or has this experience burned you out from doing history (or, well, at least for now)?

     there are many other different types of things i need to focus on
5.9.17  7:36 am   Strawberries?

5.9.17  6:07 am   When will you finish making your youtube video?

     i always finish my videos as quickly as possible. and then if i think it would be a good video for youtube, i will post it there

5.9.17  6:03 am   do you like having to explain your jokes?

     sometimes explaining a joke is a joke in itself, because to explain a joke is to imply failure of the joke. and failure is a good source for jokes
5.9.17  3:27 am   cornets or trumpets?

5.9.17  1:52 am   Are the problems you're fixing in hotewig important problems that affect the information being presented or insignificant problems like this color's off and this needs to move a few pixels to the right, etc.?

     they are important things that affect the presentation. i'm not sure if that answers your question

5.9.17  1:43 am   tips for recording good audio?

     that's not really my area of expertese

5.9.17  1:21 am   hoW do i stop biting my fingernails?

     find something else to do

5.9.17  12:53 am   wait, what? john cage didn't have the first idea for 4'33? who did?

     doing a thing that's a nothing thing has surely been done many times before. no one invented it. it's a simple prank, you set it up like there's gonna be a thing, but then 'surprise' there's no thing. it's a very fun but simple trick. everyone should try it at least once. i've done it

5.9.17  12:43 am   do you enjoy the company of infants?

     not really

5.9.17  12:30 am   What'z your favorite palindrome?

     boob

5.8.17  11:59 pm   does ivan the terrible make an appearance in your upcoming video?

     oh hell yeah

5.8.17  10:56 pm   You've increasingly have been saying "I can't tell you." What can you tell us in regarding to the status of HotEWIG? -Jaz

     i'm not talking about it anymore

5.8.17  10:24 pm   Thoughts on the connection between the pyramids and the number 17?

     i don't know of any

5.8.17  10:20 pm   Can you describe quantum physics in a sentence for me?

     you are more important to this game than you might have realized

5.8.17  9:49 pm   do you ever feel like you don't know what the fuck you're doing, or what the fuck is going on

     sometimes, but not too often anymore

5.8.17  9:42 pm   is figuring out how to cut corners on the video (or any project) while also making sure you're satisfied with it a challenge

     yes

5.8.17  9:38 pm   what type of people do you like

     each person is a unique blend of types

5.8.17  9:30 pm   is it possible to get a sweet record deal from yourself

     sure

5.8.17  8:43 pm   Dutch-Portuguese War in vid?

     i think it's portrayed as more of a theft
5.8.17  8:26 pm   what's your favorite band?

5.8.17  8:13 pm   Is it permissible for me to be content?

     sure

5.8.17  7:31 pm   is this is an exclamation.

     i don't think so
5.8.17  7:08 pm   How long is the video you've working on?

5.8.17  7:05 pm   how the hell does one become as patient as you

     find out about the sweet rewards

5.8.17  6:58 pm   MUSIC IS SO GREAT

     ah, i know what you mean
5.8.17  6:17 pm   When will there be a new YT upload

5.8.17  5:54 pm   Why did you state that New Canaan is is Pennsylvania, while New Canaan is in Connecticut?

     if you listen to the rest of the song, i think you will find a clear explanation

5.8.17  5:39 pm   Do you consider yourself a cosmopolitan?

     i just looked that up, and not really, but that would be nice

5.8.17  5:30 pm   what is your next history video about?

     i can't tell you

5.8.17  5:19 pm   do you think trigonometric functions have anything to do with trigonometry or functions

     i always assumed they did, but now i'll have to think about it

5.8.17  5:18 pm   will there be more history lessons about countries other than japan? (by yourself)

     perhaps i could think of something a little more interesting than a country

5.8.17  3:24 pm   Why are people so impatient and ungrateful regarding your new video?

     i'm not sure but they don't have to watch it if they don't want to. i don't even have to post it

5.8.17  3:16 pm   tips on improvising on piano?

     don't forget to do what you want

5.8.17  2:41 pm   do you think negative feels help create art?

     sure

5.8.17  1:39 pm   I just noticed you put "still silly" in Bandcamp albums "murder your demon", "Fun Music" and "the summertime", even though it's originally on "church sessions". Why so? Was it a mistake?

     murder your demon was more of an attempt to re group the songs based on when they were written, not when they are recorded. but this will always fail, because i will always record more. like "free to do whatever you want to" actually should have been on there too, and was actually one of the most important and sort of prototype songs for that period, but it didn't get recorded until 2015

5.8.17  1:28 pm   am i allowed to be excited.

     oh hell yeah

5.8.17  1:13 pm   opinion on nouns

     it's things! and stuff

5.8.17  12:16 pm   What sort of paintings do you like?

     there are many different ways to sort paintings. sometimes it's fun to not sort them at all

5.8.17  11:50 am   Will patreon see the video before YouTube?

     no

     Will there be video clip previews on Instagram?

     maybe

5.8.17  11:49 am   How far along are you with adjustments?

     i can't tell you

5.8.17  11:19 am   have you thought about ever making non-history documentaries?

     oh hell yeah

5.8.17  10:55 am   did you ever wish to be normal? if so, how did you rid yourself of this perverse desire

     i originally thought i was normal, until i realized that everyone else was different

5.8.17  10:51 am   Can you answer the hard questions for me?

     i will try

5.8.17  10:15 am   Would you ever consider upgrading to a newer version of Final Cut or do you consider using outdated technology to be an essential part of your work?

     final cut was cancelled, and they made a new program called "final cut x" which is a different program entirely. i am planning on switching eventually, but there is never a good time to re-learn everything i do, especially when i am trying to do content quickly and steadily without stopping
